"Rediah": "Very well. Allow me to explain Portable Holograms."
"A Portable Hologram is something you can use to display a three-dimensional image in a wide variety of places."
"You can place your favorite Holograms all throughout Halpha."
"Any Holograms you've placed down will also be visible to other ARKS!"
"I imagine it'd allow for some fun photography opportunities with your fellow ARKS."
"Could you please pick your favorite Hologram and place it down somewhere for me?"
